LESSON.HEADINGS: <1>Let's try learning the Q,Z,S and X keys.</1> <2>Very good! Now let's learn the S and X. </2> <3>Now let's add E,C,R, and V.</3> <4>Next, let's practice R and V!</4> <5>Now let's add T and B to the mix.</5> <6>Great! Now let's practice all of those.</6> <7>Just about finished now!</7> <8>And one last set!</8>
LESSON.DESCRIPTION: The third lesson lets you start trying some of the diagonal keys on the left hand. Keep your left hand on "ASDF" and right on "JKL;".
